definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: Yunfeng hydropower station is an international power station cooperated by China andDPRK.
sentences.chinese: 雲峯水電站是中朝兩國共同修建的國際電站。

sentences.english: The only lights came from the trucks that were exiting North Korea via the Sino-Korean Friendship Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的燈光來自經中朝友誼橋離開朝鮮的卡車。

sentences.english: Drunk in a dream, and rain, are waking troubles.
sentences.chinese: 醉裏秋波，夢中朝雨，都是醒時煩惱。

sentences.english: Itseems a bit surprising that there is no border fence running along theNorth Korean side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 令人有點驚訝的是中朝邊界上沒有任何的圍欄。

sentences.english: The Sino-Korean Friendship Bridge is a bond linking the Chinese and Korean peoples.
sentences.chinese: 中朝友誼橋似條紐帶，聯繫着兩岸的中朝人民。

sentences.english: Hu said China and DPRK are friendly neighbors bound by mountains and rivers.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤說，中朝兩國是山水相連的友好鄰邦。

sentences.english: He noted that China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors linked by waters and mountains.
sentences.chinese: 楊潔篪說，中朝是山水相連的友好鄰邦。

definition: North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
abbr. for 朝鮮戰爭|朝鲜战争[Chao2 xian3 Zhan4 zheng1], Korean War (1950-1953)
Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
Tumen river in Jilin province 吉林省, forming the eastern border between China and North Korea
